[[White Zetsu]] is able to plant spore-sized [[parasite clone]]s onto the bodies of others for the purpose of remotely monitoring them. As these clones [[Chakra Absorption Techniques|parasitise]] their victim's [[chakra]] and have no chakra of their own, they cannot be detected by [[Sensing Technique|standard sensory abilities]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 469, page 2</ref> Once activated via time-delay, the parasite clones suddenly expand, restricting their victim's movements and stealing greater amounts of chakra.

The absorbed chakra can be [[Chakra Transfer Technique|transferred]] to another individual by establishing physical contact with them.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 466, pages 9-11</ref> The spores can also activate in order to shield their host from harm,<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 486, page 3</ref> or be forced into activation and expelled from their host's body if that individual takes in [[senjutsu]] chakra.<ref name="ch618">''Naruto'' chapter 618, page 12</ref>

== Trivia ==
* Although the spores are usually undetectable, [[Orochimaru]] and [[Kabuto Yakushi]] are able to notice their presence due to extensive research on [[Hashirama Senju]]'s DNA.<ref name="ch618"/>
* In the anime and official digitally coloured manga, the clones grown through this technique at the [[Kage Summit]] were depicted as being entirely white in colour.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 204</ref>
